history.proof: intros e1 e2 e3 H1 H2. unfold subsume. intros H x. unfold subsume in H1, H2. intros x0. hauto use: osub_Some_inversion unfold: osub inv: option.

ctx: intros e1 e2 e3 H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 e1, e2, e3 : env A H1 : forall x : nat, osub (lookup x e1) (lookup x e2) H2 : forall x : nat, osub (lookup x e2) (lookup x e3) H : nat x : A x0 : lookup H e3 = Some x The term "x0" has type "lookup H e3 = Some x" while it is expected to have type "nat".

ctx: intros e1 e2 e3 H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 e1, e2, e3 : env A H1 : forall x : nat, osub (lookup x e1) (lookup x e2) H2 : forall x : nat, osub (lookup x e2) (lookup x e3) H : nat x : A x0 : lookup H e3 = Some x The term "x0" has type "lookup H e3 = Some x" while it is expected to have type "nat".

ctx: intros e1 e2 e3 H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 e1, e2, e3 : env A H1 : forall x : nat, osub (lookup x e1) (lookup x e2) H2 : forall x : nat, osub (lookup x e2) (lookup x e3) H : nat x : A x0 : lookup H e3 = Some x The term "x0" has type "lookup H e3 = Some x" while it is expected to have type "nat".

original: intros e1 e2 e3 H1 H2. unfold subsume. intros H x. unfold subsume in H1, H2. intros x0. specialize (H1 x0 x H). specialize (H2 x0 x H). transitivity (lookup x0 e2); auto.
